esema samiya wisin sahathika kara bharadi athi anthima kamaththa sandahan prakashayak wenas kirimata iwath kirimata nohaki bawa nithignyamahathun penwa di athi bawin adhikaranayata idiripath nokara sadharanayak laba ganima sandaha mama mema abhiyachanaya gaurawayen obathuman wethaidiripath kara sahanayak pathannemi.esema meya bambalapitiya siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwata idiripath kirima magin sahanayak nolabena nisa wenath sudusu aayathanayakata yomukara wibhaga kirimata katayuthu karadena menda illa sitimi.
